#include <cstdio>

#define MOD 1000000007
 long long int expo(long long int a,long long int b)
 {
if(b==1)
return a;
else if(b == 0)
return 1;
else if(b%2 == 0)
return expo((a*a)%MOD,b/2);
else
return (a*(expo(a,b-1) % MOD))% MOD;
 }
int main()
{
int t;
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{
long long int n,m;
scanf("%lld %lld",&n,&m);
if(n==1)
printf("%lld\n",m);
else if(n==2)
printf("%lld\n", (m * (m-1)) % MOD);
else
{
printf("%lld\n", ((m * (m-1)) % MOD * expo(m-2, n-2)) % MOD);
}
}
return 0;
}
